      • initializeBeans

        public static <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> initializeBeans(org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext context,
                                                    org.springframework.core.io.Resource res)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of beans to be created (for type safety in caller method).
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        res - the resource containing new context information
        Returns:
        initialized beans from definitions in res initialized with context

      • getBeansFromContext

                                                        java.lang.String[] names)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type (for type safety in caller method)
        Parameters:
        beanFactory - the bean factory
        names - a list of names to be retrieved from bf
        Returns:
        names of and references to the beans identified by names.

      • getBeansOfType

                                         java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Type Parameters:
        T - type parameter
        Parameters:
        ctx - the application context
        type - the type to be returned
        Returns:

      • getSingleBeanOfType

        public static <T> T getSingleBeanOfType(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext ctx,
                        java.lang.Class<T> type)
                             throws org.springframework.beans.factory.NoSuchBeanDefinitionException
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the bean
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context holding the bean
        type - the typed class
        Returns:
        the bean of the same type as type
        Throws:
        org.springframework.beans.factory.NoSuchBeanDefinitionException - if a unique bean of type could not be found (0 or more than 1 results)
        See Also:
        getBeansOfType(ApplicationContext, Class)
